page.title: 08 TOURISM IN SOUTH-AYR
page.content: Tourism in this area is mainly focused on{the beach, Burns' Cottage and{the Burns' Centre. {Burns' Cottage}has about{100 000 {visitors}every year-many from abroad, mostly from U.S.A. and Canada. {Burns' Centre}is also very popular with{85 000 visitors.}It has an audio visual theatre with multi-screen projection which offers a picturesque tour of the Burns' country. {Belleisle Park}is also an attraction. There is a hotel,large formal gardens and a conservatory with exotic plants. There is a deer park and a small menagerie. {Rozelle Park}has a more natural setting with woods and a duck pond. There is a mini-golf course and attached to Rozelle House, an Art Gallery.
